articles.title: Australian fossil reveals new plant species - Phys.org
articles.description: Antoine Champreux, a Ph.D. student in the Global Ecology Lab at Flinders University, has cataloged the discovery of the new fern-like plant species as part of an international effort to examine the Australian fossil in greater detail.

articles.title: Earth mystery: 'UNEXPECTED' structures found near Earth's core 'This is really exciting' - Express.co.uk
articles.description: MYSTERIOUS AND 'unexpected' structures have been discovered near Earth's core, according to scientists who have analysed the planet's interior using cutting edge technology.
